name: Monster Tamer
description:
Catch, raise, and fight monsters in a fantasy world!
Simple and easy drag and drop to combine monsters and evolve them into powerful monsters in no time!
Raise monsters with unique characteristics, skills, and special moves to your liking, and fight and capture the toughest enemies that stand in your way!
Depending on the combination of the monsters you collect, your strategy is limitless. Create the strongest party and embark on further journeys with your friends in online multiplayer, or decide who will come out on top in battle mode!*1
Will you be the best monster tamer?


Features
The game features simple gameplay where you catch, combine, and level up monsters that live in each field and fight them automatically.
It's easy for anyone to touch, and you can enjoy the fun of raising and collecting new monsters easily.
The unique graphics and various animations will immerse you in the world of Monster Tamer with its lifelike monsters.

The game also emphasizes a high level of strategy that can be played repeatedly and will satisfy core gamers.
Battles are greatly influenced by the combination of monsters with unique characteristics and skills, as well as special moves that can be activated at different times.
This is a system similar to Rogue Light, where you have to raise monsters from scratch each time you play, and the "process" of how you raise the monsters and have them fight is questioned, not just the "result" of raising them.
It is also possible to build decks with previously captured monsters and summon monsters from them, so the kind of deck you build is also important.*2
These complex strategies are completed by picking up monsters, combining them, putting them on the field, and letting them fight, so the system is simple and easy to touch, yet addictive enough to keep you interested.

If you're at all interested in this game, please give it a try!
Even if you are not a fan of complex games, you can play it easily and enjoy it right away.
Core gamers who want to play an interesting game will not regret it.

Video streaming is always welcome! Feel free to do so!

*1
Online multiplayer is not implemented at this stage. It will be implemented upon release.
*2
The deck formation and summoning systems are not implemented at this stage. They will be implemented upon release.
